name: 治愈强迫症 Cure Obsession
description:
This is a relaxing puzzle game.

In the game, you need to first observe the motion law of the game object, find out the disharmony, and then click the button in the game scene to make the object move regularly, and you can complete the level.

Then, you can quietly watch the game in a daze and feel the comfort.

There are more than 25 puzzles in the game

Developers will continue to update new puzzles
